definition: (coll.) to be eager for/to long for/to look forward to
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
(negative prefix)/not/no
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: “I'm desperate to go,” he declared loudly.
Saying, If thou hadst known, even thou, at least in this thy day, the things which belong unto thy peace!
sentences.chinese: 说，巴不得你在这个日子，知道关系你平安的事。

sentences.english: Reading travel brochures whets one's appetite for a holiday.
sentences.chinese: 看了旅游手册就巴不得去度假。

sentences.english: After leading a vagrant life, he was too glad to get back to his home town.
sentences.chinese: 经过一段流浪生活，他巴不得回到家乡。

sentences.english: Ah Lang Lang, 21 century you wish for me to be female to male.
sentences.chinese: 郎啊郎，巴不得二一世纪你作女来我作男。

sentences.english: He detests men's self-righteousness. He longs for all of us to learn from Noah.
sentences.chinese: 可是，他憎恶人的自义，他巴不得我们都向挪亚学习。

sentences.english: Would that for but one day I could serve You worthily !
sentences.chinese: 巴不得我能好好事奉祢一天。

sentences.english: She was so embarrassed, she wished the earth would open and swallow her up.
sentences.chinese: 她窘死了，巴不得地上能开一个口子把她吞下去。

definition: wishing one could do sth/to hate to be unable/itching to do sth
to avoid/so as to save (money or time)
see 恨不得[hen4 bu5 de5]
to look forward to
not fit to be seen by/should not be exposed to/can't bear to see
it'd be a wonder if... (following a verb phrase that is usually negative)
not worthwhile
breakfast
so as not to/so as to avoid
unpleasant to the eye/objectionable
get out of here!/beat it!
more likely than not/quite possible/on the cards
to be willing to do sth/to be ready to do sth/to be happy to do sth/content/satisfied
to think of/to keep thinking about/to be concerned about
for fear that/lest/also written 惟恐
demon personifying pestilence
